verses.1: Tua ciangin Teman khuami Elifaz in dawng a,
verses.2: “Mipil pente i cih nangawn, ama ading cih loh buang, Pasian adingin a kimanna om lo hi.
verses.3: Na gamtat hoihna in Pasianʼ phattuam nading bangmah piangsak lo a, na hoihna in Pasian hoihsak tuan lo hi.
verses.4: Nangmah in Pasian na zahtakna hangin amah in nang hong taii-in hong ze-et hi lo hi.
verses.5: Na mawhna a tamna hang, na gitlohna a liatna hang hizaw hi.
verses.6: Na sanggampaʼ leiba tangin a silh ding sitsak loin a puan teng na laksak hi.
verses.7: A dangtakte tui na pia nuam kei a, a gilkialte an na pia nuam kei hi.
verses.8: Na vangliatna le na za liatna zangin, gam khempeuh na la khin hi.
verses.9: Meigongte a huh nuam lo ciang bek hi loin, mi tagahte bawlsia-in a neihsa uh na sut hi.
verses.10: Tua ahih manin na kimkot ah thang hong kisiah a, thakhat thu-in launa in nang hong buaisak hi.
verses.11: Khuavak kimlai khuamial hong suak vatin khua na mu thei kei a, tuikhang in nang hong tuumcip hi.
verses.12: “Van a sang pen dawnah Pasian a om hi a, a sang mahmah a om aksite hong suk et lai hi.
verses.13: Ahi zongin nangmah in, ‘Pasian in bang thei ding ahi hiam? Meii in Pasian tuamcip hi. Eiteʼ thu bangci-in khen thei ding ahi hiam?’ na ci hi.
verses.14: Van khumzang ah Pasian a pai kawmin meii pailetin Pasian in hong mu suk thei lo ding hi, ci-in na ngaihsun hi.
verses.15: “Migiloteʼ gamtat ngeite mah gamtat ding ngaihsun na hi hiam?
verses.16: Amauʼ hun tung lopi-in tuikhang in amaute taai hi.
verses.17: Hih mite pen Pasian a nial, Pasian in bangmah a cih thei lo dingin a ki-um mite ahi uh hi.
verses.18: Tua hitaseleh amaute a daupaisak Pasian hi a, migiloteʼ ngaihsutna pen keima ngaihsutna tawh kigamla mahmah hi.
verses.19: Migilote tungah gim kipia a muh uh ciangin mihoihte nuam a, paubaanna a nei lo mite in a nuihsan uh hi.
verses.20: Bang hang hiam cih leh migiloteʼ neih khempeuh kisuksiatsak gawp a, a om lai sunte nangawn mei in a kaang tum hi.
verses.21: “Job aw, tu-in Pasian tawh kilem inla, amah galbawl nawn kei in. Tua hileh amah in nang thupha hong pia ding hi.
verses.22: Ama hong hilhnate zui inla, ama thute ciamteh in.
verses.23: Lungsim tak tawh Vanglian pa lamah kihei inla, na inn sung pan gamtat sia beisak inla,
verses.24: na kham neihte leivui bang lelin ngaihsunin, na Ofir khamte suang bang lelin ngaihsunin,
verses.25: Vanglian Pasian pen na kham le na ngun hisak lecin,
verses.26: Pasian muanin na nei tawntung dinga, na lungdamna bulpi amah ahih lam na thei ding hi.
verses.27: Thu na nget ciangin na ngetna hong pia dinga, nangma thuciamnate na tungsak ding hi.
verses.28: Na hih khempeuh na tangtun dinga, na maa hong vang ding hi.
verses.29: Pasian in mi kiphasakte niamkhiat a, miniamte a hon hi.
verses.30: Nang a mawhbaang lo, a gamtat man na hih nakleh nang hong hon ding hi,” a ci hi.
